title: How the dot-com bubble burst is relevant for the AI era
content: AI stocks are tumbling just liked dotcom stocks in 2000. But if past is any guide, this bubble will take a long time to deflate.
summary: AI stocks are tumbling just liked dotcom stocks in 2000. But if past is any guide, this bubble will take a long time to deflate.
